actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to employment opportunities at the National Institutes of Health for women who are scientists, and for other purposes.
short_title: NIH Women Scientist Employment Opportunity Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: NIH Women Scientist Employment Opportunity Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to require the Director of the National Institutes of Health to: (1) establish policies for NIH on matters relating to the employment of women scientists by NIH; and (2) monitor compliance with such policies and take appropriate actions if the policies have been violated. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: NIH Women Scientist Employment Opportunity Act
To amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to employment opportunities at the National Institutes of Health for women who are scientists, and for other purposes.
